revised_title: A New Fossil Plant Species: Sphenophyllum Fertile from Lower Coal-Measures
tldr: The author describes a new type of Sphenophyllaceous cone, Sphenophyllum fertile, found in the lower coal-measures. This fossil plant exhibits unique features, such as both dorsal and ventral lobes of the sporophylls being fertile, which sets it apart from other known species in the Sphenophyllales class.
